Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-0990 affecting package libxml2 for versions less than 2.10.4-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-0990 affecting package libxml2 for versions less than 2.10.4-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libxml2 is earlier than 2.10.4-10, affected by CVE-2026-0990
